snippet: The question now facing downtown New York is whether the hurricane stigma is just a short-term phenomenon, or will persist into the long term as well.
abstract: Big Deal column; real estate brokers and buyers alike are wondering whether stigma attached to downtown neighborhoods in light of heavy damage from Hurricane Sandy is passing phenomenon or one that will persist into the long term.
lead_paragraph: The question now facing downtown New York is whether the hurricane stigma is just a short-term phenomenon, or will persist into the long term as well.

headline.print_headline: Downtown, the Crystal Ball Clouds Up
headline.seo: Big Deal: Downtown, the Crystal Ball Clouds Up
headline.main: Downtown, the Crystal Ball Clouds Up
